channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Indie Publisher Humble Games Reportedly Shuts Down, 36 Jobs Lost
item.description: Humble Games, which operates under the Humble Bundle marque and owned by Ziff Davis, has reportedly laid off its entire team.

item.title: Doing it step by step

item.description: Mohawk Chevrolet hired a 23-year-old to up its social media game. Her unconventional, hilarious approach has drawn an international audience and inter...

item.title: Patterns and chaos
item.description: Finding a pattern that explains events that seem like chaos is a breakthrough. It offers us understanding and a lever we can use to make an impact. So...

item.title: Cosmic Pillars Of Creation Sparkle In New NASA Chandra View
item.description: NASA's Chandra space telescope marks 25 years in orbit with a series of 25 glorious images, including the ghostly and iconic Pillars of Creation.

item.title: Hungry (vs. not full)

item.title: A Psychologist Shares 3 Ways Men Can Escape The Modern ‘Stoicism Trap’
item.description: Misinterpreted stoicism often makes emotionless fools out of men—a label ironically worn as a badge of strength. Let’s explore the real story.

item.title: The new reality of old media

item.title: The Rise Of Data-Centric Incident Response
item.description: Data-centric security can play an essential role and fill gaps between IT and security teams that can impede effective incident response.
